mapper.sql: CARNUMBER, CARTYPE, COLOR, PRICE, RENTPRICE, DEPOSIT, ISRENTIING, DESCRIPTION, CARIMG
mapper.select:
select
from CARS
and CARNUMBER like concat(concat('%',#{carnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and CARTYPE like concat(concat('%',#{cartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and COLOR like concat(concat('%',#{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and ISRENTIING = #{isrentiing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and DESCRIPTION like concat(concat('%',#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
mapper.insert:
insert into CARS
CARNUMBER,
CARTYPE,
COLOR,
PRICE,
RENTPRICE,
DEPOSIT,
ISRENTIING,
DESCRIPTION,
CARIMG,
#{carnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{rentprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{isrentiing,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update CARS
CARTYPE = #{cartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLOR = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RENTPRICE = #{rentprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISRENTIING = #{isrentiing,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARIMG = #{carimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CARNUMBER = #{carnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CARS set CARTYPE = #{cartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLOR = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RENTPRICE = #{rentprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSIT = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ISRENTIING = #{isrentiing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARIMG = #{carimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CARNUMBER = #{carnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
